alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lauderdale and western Colbert Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 645 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cherokee, or 13 miles east of Iuka, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Cherokee, Red Rock, Posey Loop, Pride Landing, Mt Hester, Srygley Church, New Bethel and Crooked Oak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
